hero.title: World’s Largest AI-Powered Space Training Platform
hero.subtitle: In 36 months, humanity splits into two groups: Those who prepared for space and those who watch from Earth.

hero.subtitle: 36个月后，人类将分成两类：一类为太空做好了准备，另一类仍然留在地球上观望。

banner.title: 36个月到太空：
banner.subtitle: 完成训练并获得太空飞行批准
